Package CAMs

Class Staff

java.lang.Object
CAMs.User
CAMs.Staff
public class Staff extends CAMs.User
The class represents a staff member in a system or organization. It extends the `User` class, inheriting basic user information and functionality. Staff members typically have additional responsibilities and permissions in the system.
Since:
2023-11-25
Version:
3.0
Author:
Jeevika, Mathangi, Teja, Vikaas

  • Constructor Details

    • Staff

      public Staff(String name, String email, CAMs.Schools faculty)
      Constructs a new `Staff` instance with the specified name, email, and faculty.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the staff member.
      email - The email address of the staff member.
      faculty - The faculty to which the staff member belongs, represented by an instance of the `Schools` class.

      Deletes the specified camp from the list of created camps.
      Parameters:
      camp - The camp to be deleted.
      campDataManager - The camp data manager to handle data operations.

    • createCamp

      campDataManager - The camp data manager to handle data operations.

    • removeFromCampsCreated

      public void removeFromCampsCreated(CAMs.Camp camp)
      Removes the specified camp from the list of camps created by the staff. Decrements the count of created camps.
      Parameters:
      camp - The camp to be removed.
